description: Comprehensive UI/UX review of White Cross Healthcare Platform for consistency, accessibility, and user experience quality

workstreams.findings: Mixed page header patterns, inconsistent container usage, varying stats grid configurations
Strong component library foundation, but inconsistent usage across pages
Button component well-implemented, some pages use inline styles instead of components, Link usage needs improvement
Varied empty state implementations, loading states need standardization
Critical: Missing form label associations, ARIA labels needed on interactive elements

decisions.decision: Prioritize accessibility fixes (form labels) as critical priority
decisions.rationale: WCAG compliance is essential for healthcare platform
High impact on consistency with low implementation effort

decisions.decision: Standardize on PageHeader component usage across all pages
decisions.rationale: Significant consistency improvement with medium effort
